sell-by date.translation[0].definitions[: the date stamped on a food product, after which it should not be sold
a yoghurt two days past its sell-by date
a time beyond which something or someone is no longer interesting or useful
This type of games console is starting to look well past its sell-by date.
sell-by date.translation[1].definitions[: the last date that a product, especially food, should be sold
Some wine merchants have been selling the champagne past its sell-by date.
